name: SPEED RAGE (itch)
description: THIS IS A 2D BASIC GAME TO SPEED RUN.BUT IF YOU DIE YO RESTART THE GAMME  TRY TO MAKE YOUR BEST TO COMPLETTE THE GAME . THIS GAME WAS CREAT BY RAW . ITS A 2D PLATFORMER YOU ARE A PIXEL BOX AND TRY TO SPEED RUN THE GAME BUT IF YOU DIE YOU RESTART THE GAMME .TRY TO MAKE YOUR BEST SCORE.
